poem.title: from Mandelshtam
poem.author: Osip Mandelshtam
poem.text:
Come and we'll sit in the kitchen, us two,
Where the white kerosene smells sweet;
A sharp knife, and a loaf of bread.
Go on: you can set the stove to roasting
Or maybe gather up some twine
To tie the case shut. Before dawn
We could take a tram down to the station
Where they'd not think to look.
